root.name: Soccer League - Winner's Cup
root.description: OverviewSoccer League - Winner's Cup is a side-scrolling soccer game where the goal is to take an international side to the final and win the World Cup. The player can select from one of eight nations, in the order they appear on the select screen:JapanGermanyBrazilFranceSouth KoreaThe United KingdomArgentinaThe United States of AmericaThe game has the option for two-player, as well as a regular single-player competition against the CPU.
